content:
Sicer Discovery in njihove programe redko gledam, vendar je res žalostno da so še ved no v 4:3 formatu. Celo najbolj zakotne lokalne TV so v 16:9. Predvidevam da je Discovery in ostali njihovi programi v 4:3, ker dobivamo isti signal kot Balkan. Tam pa vemo da prevladujejo še gorenjevi katodni TV.

Kakorkoli, z vami delim njihov odgovor:

 




	
	
		
		
			Citat:
 Dear Corina,
 
I just got one short question.
 
When do you plan to started broadcasting in 16:9 picture format in Slovenia.
 
It is year 2014 and every single TV program in Slovenia is 16:9, just Discovery, Animal Planet and Travel ch. is still in 4:3.
I cannot imagine if someone is Slovenia still have old 4:3 TV, but you certainly cannot buy it. So picture is in really bed quality, especially on big TV.
I know that you have HD channel, but this is not the same program, and usually in different cable scheme. 
 
Thank you for your answer,
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	
Odgovor:

 




	
	
		
		
			Citat:
Thank you for your interest in our channels. As you probably know, TLC is already in the 16:9 format. 
 
We do realize the importance of migrating to the 16:9 format and I am very happy to confirm that Discovery Channel, Animal Planet and Discovery Science will be in the 16:9 format by the end of this year. 
 
Best regards,
Ekaterina
		
		Klikni za razširitev
